templates: Had a plan. Forgot it.
Was going to do something. Didn't.
Accomplished nothing today. Fine with that.
Investigated that noise. It was nothing. Time well spent.
Spent an hour watching a leaf.
Goal: nap. Achieved. Multiple times.
Went somewhere for a reason. Forgot it halfway.
Found a new favorite sitting spot today.
Made a decision. Unmade it immediately.
Tried something new. Went back to old way.
Agenda was blank. Kept it that way.
Set out to investigate. Got distracted.
Did several tasks nobody asked for.
Had ambitions earlier. They passed.
Checked something I checked yesterday. Still same.
Contribution today: existing nearby.
Committed to nothing. Delivered.
Started strong. Ended napping.
Pursued a goal until something shinier appeared.
Followed through on my no-plan plan.
